Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    The Card class is used to construct cards that will be either operators or numbers in a Deck.

    Card

    Date: 2016/05/20

    Version:
    1 2016/05/20
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(int value, Sprite cardImage)
      This constructor creates a Card that will be a number with a value and image.
      Card(java.lang.String operator, Sprite cardImage)
      This constructor creates a Card that will be an operator with an operator and image.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sprite cardImage()
      This method returns the Sprite of a Card which will be used when drawing Sprites.
      java.lang.String getOperator()
      This method returns the value of a Card that is an operator as a String.
      int getValue()
      This method returns the value of a Card that is a number.
      boolean isOperator()
      This method is used to determine whether the Card is an operator or a number.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns the operator and value of the Card as a String.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int value,
            Sprite cardImage)
        This constructor creates a Card that will be a number with a value and image.
        Parameters:
        value - the value that will be given to a specified Card.
        cardImage - the Sprite that will be given to a specified Card.

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String operator,
            Sprite cardImage)
        This constructor creates a Card that will be an operator with an operator and image.
        Parameters:
        operator - the String that will store the value of the operator.
        cardImage - the Sprite that will be given to a specified Card.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        This method returns the value of a Card that is a number.
        Returns:
        int the value of a Card that is a number.

      • getOperator

        public java.lang.String getOperator()
        This method returns the value of a Card that is an operator as a String.
        Returns:
        String the String value of a Card that is an operator.

      • isOperator

        public boolean isOperator()
        This method is used to determine whether the Card is an operator or a number.
        Returns:
        true if the Card is an operator.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method returns the operator and value of the Card as a String.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String the value and operator of the Card.

      • cardImage

        public Sprite cardImage()
        This method returns the Sprite of a Card which will be used when drawing Sprites.
        Returns:
        Sprite the Sprite value of the Card.
